review: Great product for streaming and works well.
author: JR

review: Great little item for a good price...fast ship too
author: angelblueyes

review: Delivery is on time. Great product. Kids love it
author: Akmal Faiz bin Razali

review: Easy to setup. It did take a few minutes. Comes with everything you need to setup and watch. Streams everything I wanted it for. I haven't used the other app for streaming video yet.
author: Russ Brown

review: By far the best Streaming media player in the market...  And the best thing is that it is constantly improving.Buy it fast!
author: Tom Dollar

review: I LOVE my chrome cast!  Can I just say that I'm not a tech genius and I end up asking my poor husband why to many questions about my phone or my tablet/laptop.  Sometimes I get so feed up I just don't go near anything but my television.  Then I got my husband a chromecast for Christmas and it changed everything!  So easy to use,  even to me and now I can watch Netflix and Hulu whenever I want.  I'm even getting one for my dad who still uses the term "fire up the computer".  All you have to do is press a button and then you watch your shows/YouTube videos on your television... AGAIN so easy.
author: Jane Green

review: I didn't realize it needed external power when I got it. There was a usb that supposedly could plug into my tv, but it seems there isn't enough power there so I had to find another outlet (not an easy task where I have my TV). It's funny, I wanted to go wireless, but still ended up with a wire. It streams ok, but is reliant on the apps surrounding it, I'll jail break it If I ever can.
author: RJ

review: Turned my dumb tv into a smart tv. Cool features for a good price
author: brian flynn
